meanings.definition: A track or path along which something moves or is guided.
meanings.sent1: The train smoothly glided along the guideway.
meanings.sent2: The roller coaster followed the guideway through twists and turns.
meanings.sent3: The guideway seemed to play a game of tag with the vehicles, always leading the way.
meanings.sent4: Her ambition was the guideway to success, guiding her through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The guideway, like a loyal friend, never failed to show the right direction.

meanings.definition: A system of tracks or paths for guiding vehicles or machinery.
meanings.sent1: The airport shuttle runs on a sophisticated guideway system.
meanings.sent2: The factory implemented a new guideway for the automated forklifts.
meanings.sent3: The guideway network was so efficient that even the robots were impressed.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the guideway of traffic lights controlled the flow of cars.
meanings.sent5: The guideway of conveyor belts ensured smooth operations in the warehouse.
